root.Summary: 1: Li R, Beaudoin F, Ammah AA, Bissonnette N, Benchaar C, Zhao X, Lei C,Ibeagha-Awemu EM. Deep sequencing shows microRNA involvement in bovine mammarygland adaptation to diets supplemented with linseed oil or safflower oil. BMCGenomics. 2015 Oct 30;16(1):884. doi: 10.1186/s12864-015-1965-7. PubMed PMID:26519053; PubMed Central PMCID: PMC4628385.
